sections.heading: and minimum weekly income benefit; amounts; Governor; power to suspend
sections.text: (1)(a)(i) Commencing July 1, 1991, the maximum weekly income benefit under sections 48-121 and 48-122 shall be two hundred sixty-five dollars.(ii) Commencing June 1, 1994, the maximum weekly income benefit under sections 48-121 a

sections.heading: does not prohibit a worker from concurrently receiving statutory benefits for separate injuries arising out of separate accidents, so long as the combined payments do not exceed the maximum weekly rate allowed by this section
sections.text: Vega v. Iowa Beef Processors, 264 Neb. 282, 646 N.W.2d 643 (2002).
